msbt.message: Dear Mysterious Stranger...
YOU FOUND IT! YOU FOUND IT!
Thanks for picking this up!
Here's a SECRET! And I secreted it!
Dear Person-I-Don't-Know,
I was walking around yesterday, picking up DIY stuff, and I came up with a great recipe!
I dreamed I was an Ultra Super Big-Time Master of DIY! Here's the recipe I made in my dream!
I did a DIY and got the stuff wrong. So I made this on accident! Man, I tell ya. I'm ALL accidents today!
A weird DIY TV show I watched at 2 a.m. told me to make this. So I did. Here's the recipe.
I found a recipe in an old dinosaur book I didn't know I still had. That dino's gotta be real mad by now.
I thought it smelled good, so I want to share that smell with you!
I coulda kept it for just me, but I like sharing fun stuff.
I put the recipe in the bottle so someone else could make it too!
It's real easy! My head was stuck in my shirt and I still did the DIY!
I almost ate it because I was sleepy and hungry, but I'm glad I didn't.
You should try making it too!
Share the recipe with folks!
I hope you make it too.
If you make it, scream "I MADE IT!"
Be careful when YDI! That's a joke!
By , Master Crafter
By the Smart Guy!
– aka D.I.Y. M.A.N.
–Capt. T. Crafter
The DIY who DIH!

Here is a recipe to DIY yourself a mirror that lets you DIY the way you look! Be the you that you wanna be. And always like the you that you are since you're real neat. (P.S. look out for more recipes!)
